question.text: You are on a road that is only wide enough for one vehicle. There is a car coming towards you. What should you do?

explanation.text: Pull into the nearest passing place on the left if you meet another vehicle in a narrow road. If the nearest passing place is on the right, wait opposite it.

answer.text: Pull into a passing place on your right
Force the other driver to reverse
Pull into a passing place if your vehicle is wider
Pull into a passing place on your left
